사이오닉 파워 개요

PSIONIC POWERS OVERVIEW

사이오닉 파워 spring from sentient minds. Even an undead creature or a being that has no physical form can create a reserve of inner 근력 necessary to manifest powers, as long as it has an 지능 score of at least 1. Vermin possessed of a hive mind ability are an exception to this rule.

A psionic power is a one-time psionic effect. Psionic characters and creatures need not prepare their powers for use ahead of time. They either have sufficient 파워 포인트 to manifest a power or they do not.

A power is manifested when a psionic character pays its power point cost. Some 사이오닉 생명체 automatically manifest powers, called 유사사이오닉 능력, without paying a power point cost. Other creatures pay 파워 포인트 to manifest their powers, just as characters do.

Each power has a specific effect. A power known to a psionic character can be used whenever he or she has 파워 포인트 to pay for it.

파워 구현

MANIFESTING POWERS

Psionic characters and creatures manifest powers. Whether they cost 파워 포인트 when manifest by a psionic character, or are manifested as 유사사이오닉 능력, powers’ effects remain the same. The process of manifesting a power is akin to casting a spell, but with significant differences.

파워 선택하기

CHOOSING A POWER

First you must choose which power to manifest. You can select any power you know, provided you are capable of 파워 구현 of that 레벨 or higher. To manifest a power, you must pay 파워 포인트, which count against your daily total. You can manifest the same power multiple times if you have points left to pay for it.

집중

CONCENTRATION

To manifest a power, you must concentrate. If something threatens to interrupt your 집중 while you’re manifesting a power, you must succeed on a 집중 check or lose the 파워 포인트 without manifesting the power. The more distracting the interruption and the higher the 레벨 of the power that you are trying to manifest, the higher the DC. (Higher-레벨 powers require more mental effort.)

Injury: Getting hurt or being affected by hostile 사이오닉 while trying to manifest a power can break your 집중 and 파멸 a power. If you take 피해 while trying to manifest a power, you must make a 집중 check (DC 10 + points of 피해 taken + the 레벨 of the power you’re manifesting). The interrupting event strikes during manifestation if it occurs between when you start and when you complete manifesting a power (for a power with a 구현 시간 of 1 round or longer) or if it comes in response to your manifesting the power (such as an 공격 of opportunity provoked by the manifesting of the power or a contingent 공격 from a readied action).

If you are taking continuous 피해 half the 피해 is considered to take place while you are manifesting a power. You must make a 집중 check (DC 10 + 1/2 the 피해 that the continuous source last dealt + the 레벨 of the power you’re manifesting).

If the last 피해 dealt was the last 피해 that the effect could deal then the 피해 is over, and it does not 주의산만 you.

Repeated 피해 does not count as continuous 피해.

Power: If you are affected by a power while attempting to manifest a power of your own, you must make a 집중 check or lose the power you are manifesting. If the power affecting you deals 피해, the 집중 DC is 10 + points of 피해 + the 레벨 of the power you’re manifesting. If the power interferes with you or 주의산만 you in some other way, the 집중 DC is the power’s save DC + the 레벨 of the power you’re manifesting. For a power with no 내성 굴림, it’s the DC that the power’s 내성 굴림 would have if a save were allowed.

Grappling or Pinned: To manifest a power while grappling or pinned, you must make a 집중 check (DC 20 + the 레벨 of the power you’re manifesting) or lose the power.

Vigorous Motion: If you are riding on a moving 탈것 소환, taking a bouncy 탑승 in a wagon, on a small boat in rough water, belowdecks in a storm-tossed ship, or simply being jostled in a similar fashion, you must make a 집중 check (DC 10 + the 레벨 of the power you’re manifesting) or lose the power.

Violent Motion: If you are on a galloping 말, taking a very rough 탑승 in a wagon, on a small boat in rapids or in a storm, on deck in a storm-tossed ship, or being tossed roughly about in a similar fashion, you must make a 집중 check (DC 15 + the 레벨 of the power you’re manifesting) or lose the power.

Violent 날씨: If you are in a high wind carrying blinding rain or sleet, the DC is 5 + the 레벨 of the power you’re manifesting. If you are in wind-driven hail, dust, or debris, the DC is 10 + the 레벨 of the power you’re manifesting. In either case, you lose the power if you fail the 집중 check. If the 날씨 is caused by a power, use the rules in the Power subsection above.

파워 구현 on the Defensive: If you want to manifest a power without provoking 기회 공격, you need to 회피 and weave. You must make a 집중 check (DC 15 + the 레벨 of the power you’re manifesting) to succeed. You lose the 파워 포인트 without successful manifestation if you fail.

Entangled: If you want to manifest a power while entangled in a net or while affected by a power with similar effects you must make a DC 15 집중 check to manifest the power. You lose the power if you fail.

구현자 레벨

MANIFESTER LEVEL

The variables of a power’s effect often depend on its 구현자 레벨, which is equal to your psionic class 레벨. A power that can be augmented for additional effect is also limited by your 구현자 레벨 (you can’t spend more 파워 포인트 on a power than your 구현자 레벨). See Augment under 설명 문구, below.

You can manifest a power at a lower 구현자 레벨 than normal, but the 구현자 레벨 must be high enough for you to manifest the power in question, and all 레벨-dependent features must be based on the same 구현자 레벨.

In the event that a class feature or other special ability provides an adjustment to your 구현자 레벨, this adjustment applies not only to all effects based on 구현자 레벨 (such as 거리, 지속시간, and augmentation potential) but also to your 구현자 레벨 check to overcome your target’s 파워 저항 and to the 구현자 레벨 used in dispel checks (both the dispel check and the DC of the check).

파워 실패

POWER FAILURE

If you try to manifest a power in 상태이상 where the characteristics of the power (거리, 범위, and so on) cannot be made to conform, the manifestation fails and the 파워 포인트 are wasted.

Powers also fail if your 집중 is broken (see 집중, above).

파워의 결과

THE POWER’S RESULT

Once you know which creatures (or objects or 범위) are affected, and whether those creatures have made successful 내성 굴림 (if any were allowed), you can apply whatever results a power entails.

특수 파워 효과

SPECIAL POWER EFFECTS

Certain special features apply to all powers.

공격: Some powers refer to attacking. All offensive 전투 actions, even those that don’t 피해 opponents, such as 무장해제 and 황소 쇄도, are considered 공격. All powers that opponents can resist with 내성 굴림, that deal 피해, or that otherwise 해악 or hamper subjects are considered 공격. 영적 구조물 and similar powers are not considered 공격 because the powers themselves don’t 해악 anyone.

Bonus Types: Many powers give creatures bonuses to 능력 점수, 방어도, 공격, and other attributes. Each bonus has a type that indicates how the power grants the bonus. The important aspect of bonus types is that two bonuses of the same type don’t generally stack. With the exception of 회피 bonuses, most circumstance bonuses, and racial bonuses, only the better bonus works (see 사이오닉과 마법 효과 조합하기, below). The same principle applies to penalties—a character taking two or more penalties of the same type applies only the worst one.

Bringing Back the 죽음: Of all the 사이오닉 파워, only 현실 수정 has the ability to restore slain characters to life. When a living creature dies, its soul departs the body, leaves 물질 세계, travels through 영적 세계, and goes to abide on the plane where the creature’s deity resides. If the creature did not worship a deity, its soul departs to the plane corresponding to its 성향. Bringing someone back from the 죽음 means retrieving his or her soul and returning it to his or her body.

레벨 손실: The passage from life to death and back again is a wrenching journey for a being’s soul. Consequently, any creature brought back to life usually loses one 레벨 of experience. The character’s new experience point total is midway between the minimum needed for his or her new (reduced) 레벨 and the minimum needed for the next one. If the character was 1 레벨 at the time of death, he or she loses 2 points of 건강 instead of losing a 레벨. This 레벨 손실 or 건강 loss cannot be repaired by any mortal means, even the 주문 소원 or 기적. A revived character can regain a lost 레벨 by earning XP through further adventuring. A revived character who was 1 레벨 at the time of death can regain lost points of 건강 by improving his or her 건강 score when he or she attains a 레벨 that allows an ability score increase.

Preventing Revivif cation: Enemies can take steps to make it more difficult for a character to be returned from the 죽음. Keeping the body prevents others from using a single manifestation of 현실 수정 to restore the slain character to life.

Revivif cation Against One’s Will: A soul cannot be returned to life if it does not 소원 to be. A soul knows the 이름, 성향, and patron deity (if any) of the character attempting to revive it and may refuse to return on that basis.

사이오닉과 마법 효과 조합하기

COMBINING PSIONIC AND MAGICAL EFFECTS

The default rule for the interaction of 사이오닉 and magic is simple: Powers interact with 주문 and 주문 interact with powers in the same way a spell or normal spell-like ability interacts with another spell or spell-like ability. This is known as 사이오닉–magic transparency.

사이오닉–Magic Transparency: Though not explicitly called out in the 주문 설명 or 마법 아이템 설명, 주문, spell-like 능력, and 마법 아이템 that could potentially affect 사이오닉 do affect 사이오닉.

When the rule about 사이오닉–magic transparency is in effect, it has the following ramifications.

주문 저항 is effective against powers, using the same mechanics. Likewise, 파워 저항 is effective against 주문, using the same mechanics as 주문 저항. If a creature has one kind of 저항, it is assumed to have the other. (The effects have similar ends despite having been brought about by different means.)

All 주문 that 마법 무효화 have equal effect against powers of the same 레벨 using the same mechanics, and vice versa.

The spell 마법 감지 detects powers, their number, and their 근력 and location within 3 rounds (though a 사이크래프트 check is necessary to 식별 the 분야 of the psionic aura).

죽음 magic 범위 are also 죽음 사이오닉 범위.

Multiple Effects: Powers or psionic effects usually work as described no matter how many other powers, psionic effects, 주문, or magical effects happen to be operating in the same 범위 or on the same recipient. Except in special cases, a power does not affect the way another power or spell operates. Whenever a power has a specific effect on other powers or 주문, the power 묘사 explains the effect (and vice versa for 주문 that affect powers). Several other general rules apply when powers, 주문, magical effects, or psionic effects operate in the same place.

Stacking Effects: Powers that provide bonuses or penalties on 명중 굴림, 피해 rolls, 내성 굴림, and other attributes usually do not stack with themselves. More generally, two bonuses of the same type don’t stack even if they come from different powers, or one from a power and one from a spell. You use whichever bonus gives you the better result.

Different Bonus Types: The bonuses or penalties from two different powers, or a power and a spell, stack if the effects are of different types. A bonus that isn’t named (just a “+2 bonus” rather than a “+2 insight bonus”) stacks with any bonus.

Same Effect More than Once in Different 근력: In cases when two or more similar or identical effects are operating in the same 범위 or on the same target, but at different 근력, only the best one applies. If one power or spell is dispelled or its 지속시간 달리기 out, the other power or spell remains in effect (assuming its 지속시간 has not yet expired).

Same Effect with Differing Results: The same power or spell can sometimes produce varying effects if applied to the same recipient more than once. The last effect in a series trumps the others. None of the previous 주문 or powers are actually removed or dispelled, but their effects become irrelevant while the final spell or power in the series lasts.

One Effect Makes Another Irrelevant: Sometimes, a power can render another power irrelevant.

Multiple Mental Control Effects: Sometimes psionic or magical effects that establish mental control render one another irrelevant. Mental controls that don’t remove the recipient’s ability to act usually do not interfere with one another, though one may modify another. If a creature is under the control of two or more creatures, it tends to obey each to the best of its ability, and to the extent of the control each effect allows. If the controlled creature receives conflicting orders simultaneously, the competing controllers must make opposed 매력 checks to determine which one the creature obeys.

Powers and 주문 with Opposite Effects: Powers and 주문 with opposite effects apply normally, with all bonuses, penalties, or changes accruing in the order that they apply. Some powers and 주문 negate or counter each other. This is a special effect that is noted in a power’s or spell’s 묘사.

Instantaneous Effects: Two or more magical or psionic effects with instantaneous 지속시간 work cumulatively when they affect the same object, place, or creature.

파워와 파워 포인트

POWERS AND POWER POINTS

Psionic characters manifest powers, which involve the direct manipulation of personal mental energy. These manipulations require natural talent and personal meditation. A psionic character’s 레벨 limits the number of 파워 포인트 available to manifest powers. A psionic character’s relevant high score might allow him to gain extra 파워 포인트. He can manifest the same power more than once, but each manifestation subtracts 파워 포인트 from his daily limit. Manifesting a power is an arduous mental task. To do so, a psionic character must have a key ability score of at least 10 + the power’s 레벨.

Daily Power Point Acquisition: To regain used daily 파워 포인트, a psionic character must have a clear mind. To clear his mind, he must first 수면 for 8 hours. The character does not have to slumber for every minute of the time, but he must refrain from 이동, 전투, 파워 구현, skill use, conversation, or any other demanding physical or mental task during the rest period. If his rest is interrupted, each interruption adds 1 hour to the total amount of time he has to rest to clear his mind, and he must have at least 1 hour of rest immediately prior to regaining lost 파워 포인트. If the character does not need to 수면 for some reason, he still must have 8 hours of restful calm before regaining 파워 포인트.

Recent Manifesting Limit/Rest Interruptions: If a psionic character has manifested powers recently, the drain on his resources reduces his capacity to regain 파워 포인트. When he regains 파워 포인트 for the coming day, all 파워 포인트 he has used within the last 8 hours count against his daily limit.

Peaceful 환경: To regain 파워 포인트, a psionic character must have enough peace, quiet, and comfort to allow for proper 집중. The psionic character’s surroundings need not be luxurious, but they must be free from overt distractions, such as 전투 raging nearby or other loud noises. Exposure to inclement 날씨 prevents the necessary 집중, as does any injury or failed 내성 굴림 the character might incur while concentrating on regaining 파워 포인트.

Regaining 파워 포인트: Once the character has rested in a suitable 환경, it takes only an act of 집중 spanning 1 full round to regain all 파워 포인트 of the psionic character’s daily limit.

Death and 파워 포인트: If a character dies, all daily 파워 포인트 stored in his mind are wiped away. A potent effect (such as 현실 수정) can recover the lost 파워 포인트 when it recovers the character.

파워 추가하기

ADDING POWERS

Psionic characters can learn new powers when they attain a new 레벨. A 사이언 can learn any power from the 사이언/와일더 list and powers from his chosen 분야’s list. A 와일더 can learn any power from the 사이언/와일더 list. A 사이킥 군인 can learn any power from the 사이킥 군인 list.

Powers Gained at a New 레벨: 사이언 and other psionic characters 공연 a certain amount of personal meditation between adventures in an attempt to unlock latent mental 능력. Each time a psionic character attains a new 레벨, he or she learns additional powers according to his class 묘사. 사이언, 사이킥 군인, and 와일더 learn new powers of their choice in this fashion. These powers represent 능력 unlocked from latency. The powers must be of 레벨 the characters can manifest.

Independent Research: A 사이언 also can research a power independently, duplicating an existing power or creating an entirely new one. If characters are allowed to develop new powers, use these guidelines to handle the situation.

Any kind of manifester can create a new power. The research involved requires access to a retreat conducive to uninterrupted meditation. Research involves an expenditure of 200 XP per week and takes one week per 레벨 of the power. At the end of that time, the character makes a 사이크래프트 check (DC 10 + spell 레벨). If that check succeeds, the character learns the new power if her research produced a viable power. If the check fails, the character must go through the research process again if she wants to keep trying.

다른이의 모르는 파워 구현
Manifest an Unknown Power from Another’s Powers Known

A psionic character can attempt to manifest a power from a source other than his own 지식 (usually a power stone or another willing psionic character). To do so, the character must first make contact (a process similar to addressing a power stone, requiring a 사이크래프트 check against a DC of 15+ the 레벨 of the power to be manifested). A psionic character can make contact with only a willing psionic character or creature (unconscious creatures are considered willing, but not psionic characters under the effects of other immobilizing 상태이상). Characters who can’t use 파워스톤 for any reason are also banned from attempting to manifest powers from the 지식 of other psionic characters. Mental contact requires 1 full round of physical contact, which can provoke 기회 공격. Once contact is achieved, the character becomes aware of all the powers stored in the power stone or all the powers the other character knows up to the highest 레벨 of power the contactor knows himself.

Next, the psionic character must choose one of the powers and make a second 사이크래프트 check (DC 15 + the power’s 레벨) to see if he understands it. If the power is not on his class list, he automatically fails this check.

Upon successfully making contact with another willing psionic character or creature and learning what he can of one power in particular, the character can immediately attempt to manifest that power even if he doesn’t know it (and assuming he has 파워 포인트 left for the day). He can attempt to manifest the power normally on his next turn, and he succeeds if he makes one additional 사이크래프트 check (DC 15 + the power’s 레벨). He retains the ability to manifest the selected power for only 1 round. If he doesn’t manifest the power, fails the 사이크래프트 check, or manifests a different power, he loses his chance to manifest that power for the day.

저장된 파워 포인트 사용하기

USING STORED POWER POINTS

A variety of 사이오닉 아이템 exist to store 파워 포인트 for later use, in particular a storage device called a cognizance crystal. Regardless of what sort of item stores the 파워 포인트, all psionic characters must follow strict rules when tapping stored 파워 포인트.

A Single Source: When using 파워 포인트 from a storage item to manifest a power, a psionic character may not pay the power’s cost with 파워 포인트 from more than one source. He must either use an item, his own power point reserve, or some other discrete power point source to pay the manifestation cost.

Recharging: Most power point storage devices allow psionic characters to “recharge” the item with their own 파워 포인트. Doing this depletes the character’s power point reserve on a 1-for-1 basis as if he had manifested a power; however, those 파워 포인트 remain indefinitely stored. The opposite is not true—psionic characters may not use 파워 포인트 stored in a storage item to replenish their own power point reserves.

특수 능력

SPECIAL ABILITIES

사이오닉 생명체 can create psionic effects without having 레벨 in a psionic class (although they can take a psionic class to further enhance their 능력); such creatures have 사이오닉 하위 유형.

Characters using 도르제, 인식의 결정, and other 사이오닉 아이템 can also create psionic effects. In addition to existing spell-like and supernatural 능력, creatures can also have 유사사이오닉 능력. (사이오닉 생명체 may also have extraordinary and natural 능력.)

유사사이오닉 능력 (Ps): The manifestation of powers by a psionic character is considered a psi-like ability, as is the manifestation of powers by creatures without a psionic class (creatures with 사이오닉 하위 유형, also simply called 사이오닉 생명체). Usually, a psionic creature’s psi-like ability works just like the power of that 이름. A few 유사사이오닉 능력 are unique; these are explained in the text where they are described.

유사사이오닉 능력 have no verbal, somatic, or material 구성요소, nor do they require a focus or have an XP cost (even if the equivalent power has an XP cost). The user activates them mentally. 갑옷 never affects a psi-like ability’s use. A psi-like ability has a 구현 시간 of 1 standard action unless noted otherwise in the ability 묘사. In all other ways, a psi-like ability functions just like a power. However, a psionic creature does not have to pay a psi-like ability’s power point cost.

유사사이오닉 능력 are subject to 파워 저항 and to being dispelled by 사이오닉 무효화. They do not function in 범위 where 사이오닉 is suppressed or negated.

Supernatural 능력: Some creatures have psionic 능력 that are considered supernatural. 사이오닉 특기 are also supernatural 능력. These 능력 cannot be disrupted in 전투, as powers can be, and do not provoke 기회 공격 (except as noted in their 묘사). Supernatural 능력 are not subject to 파워 저항 and cannot be negated or dispelled; however, they do not function in 범위 where 사이오닉 is suppressed.

사이오닉 질병

PSIONIC MALADIES

Ability Burn: This is a special form of ability 피해 that cannot be magically or psionically healed. It is caused by the use of certain 사이오닉 특기 and powers. It returns only through natural 치료.

질병, Cascade Flu: Spread by 뇌 두더지 and other vermin; injury; DC 13; incubation one day; 피해 psionic cascade.

A psionic cascade is a loss of control over psionic 능력. Using 파워 포인트 becomes dangerous for a character infected by cascade flu, once the incubation period has 달리기 its course. Every time an afflicted character manifests a power, she must make a DC 16 집중 check. On a failed check, a psionic cascade is triggered. The power operates normally, but during the following round, without the character’s volition, two additional powers she knows manifest randomly, and their power cost is deducted from the character’s reserve. During the next round, three additional powers manifest, and so on, until all the psionic character’s 파워 포인트 are drained. Powers with a 거리 of personal or touch always affect the diseased character. For other powers that affect targets, roll d%: On a 01–50 result, the power affects the diseased character, and 51–00 indicates that the power targets other creatures in the vicinity. 사이오닉 생명체 (those that manifest their powers without paying points) cascade until all the powers they know have manifested at least twice.

As with any 질병, a psionic character who is injured or attacked by a creature carrying a 질병 or parasite, or who otherwise has contact with contaminated material, must make an immediate Fortitude save. On a success, the 질병 fails to gain a foothold. On a failure, the character takes 피해 (or incurs the specified effect) after the incubation period. Once per day afterward, the afflicted character must make a successful Fortitude save to avoid repeating the 피해. Two successful 내성 굴림 in a row indicate she has fought off the 질병.
